symbol : method appendToIpBanned(java.lang.String)
location: class client

^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.

Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Please, help with ipban, i have all-star souce
item.dc:creator: @billybob123 billybob123
item.description:
@billybob123 wrote:

look in client.java near middle look for last command and after it put: if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ipban”)&& playerRights >= 3){
appendToIpBanned(playerName);
sendMessage(“you have ipbaned a player”);
sendMessage(“You have left to spend”);
}
